name: dry food for dogs
title: Matzinger Mini Menu · dry food for dogs · beef
description: Matzinger dry food for dogs beef

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Cereals (whole grain 55%), Meat and animal derivatives (15% of which 4% beef), Oils and fats, Derivatives of vegetable origin, Vegetable protein extracts, minerals.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 19000; Vit D3: 1100; Vit E: 90; mg/kg: Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 78); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 1.9); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu: 8.7); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn: 5.9); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn:110); Sodium selenite: (Se: 0.1); Vitamin B group: 75.Colourants(1) and antioxidants(1)no artificial colourants.Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 19000; Vit D3: 1100; Vit E: 90; mg/kg: 3b103: (Fe: 78); 3b202: (I: 1.9); 3b405: (Cu: 8.7); 3b503: (Mn: 5.9); 3b605: (Zn:110); 3b801: (Se: 0.1); Vitamin B group: 75.Colourants(1) and antioxidants(1)no artificial colourants.

usageInformation.usage: MATZINGER Mini Menu is a balanced complete food for dogs of small breeds. The specially developed smaller croquettes contain high-quality ingredients and fibre for a healthy digestion.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: For more than 80 years, Nestlé Purina experts have been studying the influence of nutrition on the health and vitality of dogs. The MATZINGER® brand is the result of these efforts. Carefully matched to the size, age, lifestyle and physical condition of your faithful companion, MATZINGER® products ensure that your dog is healthy, happy and full of joie de vivre.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide: Daily Feeding Amounts for Small dog For Mix Feeding Dry Wet Normal Activity More Active wet pouch* Body Weight Quantity Dry Quantity Dry (kg) (g/Day) (g/Day) (100g) 1 20 25 1 5 95 110 1 10 140 165 2 *of any “Friskies pouch in Gravy” Adult 100g pouch. Availability can vary from one country to another. These amounts are averages based on moderately active dogs at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your dog at a lean, healthy body weight. Fresh clean drinking water should be always available. Feeding guide: Product can be fed alone or in combination with Friskies pouches: Daily Feeding Amounts for Adult Small dog Normally active More active Body Weight (Kg) Quantity (g/day) Quantity (g/day) Toy 1 – 5 40 – 115 45 – 130 Small 5 – 10 115 – 180 130 – 210 These amounts are averages based on moderately active dogs at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your dog at a lean, healthy body weight. Fresh clean drinking water should be always available.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for small adult dogs up to 10kg
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.value: Dies sind Durchschnittswerte,  basierend auf den Bedürfnissen von kleinrassigen,  ausgewachsenen Hunden mit unterschiedlichen Aktivitätsniveaus bei normalen Umgebungstemperaturen. Die individuellen Bedürfnisse können variieren und die Futtermenge sollte entsprechend angepasst werden. Sauberes,  frisches Trinkwasser sollte stets zur Verfügung stehen.
